comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Not a great deal has changed since this photo (c.1935 - is it one of the Railway pictures?). The Hotel has lost its verandah; the Bank of Australasia is no longer a bank; power poles have gone; and there is now - a ROUNDABOUT ! Google street view - maps.google.com.au/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: This photograph is from NRS12932 Original Prints of Photographs used in NSW trains. The photographs were used to decorate the carriage interiors of country trains. Does look abit different with a roundabout!!
